content: --- title: Stations Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:24:30.741Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:39:56.492Z --- # Stations Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | stationId | `'string'` | Station IATA code | | icao | `'string'` | Station ICAO code | | stationName | `'string'` | Station name | | city | `'string'` | City | | region | `'string'` | Region or state | | country | `'string'` | Country | | address | `'string'` | Address of the station | | timezone | `'string'` | Current timezone of the station | | latitude | `'string'` | Latitude of the station | | longitude | `'string'` | Longtitude of the station | | email | `'string'` | Email address of the station | | phone | `'string'` | Phone number of the station | | fax | `'string'` | Fax address of the station | | telex | `'string'` | Telex address of the station | | manager | `'string'` | Name of the manager of the station | | managerEmail | `'string'` | Email address of the manager of the station | | managerPhone | `'string'` | Phone number of manager of the station | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
